title: Presumptive COVID-19 case connected to Dalhousie University - CTV News

content: HALIFAX Dalhousie University in Halifax has been connected to a presumptive positive case of COVID Deep Saini president and vice chancellor of Dalhousie University informed the Dalhousie community of the presumptive positive case in a campus wide chars
